description.zh: 粒子系统是游戏引擎特效表现的基础，它可以用于模拟的火、烟、水、云、雪、落叶等自然现象，也可用于模拟发光轨迹、速度线等抽象视觉效果。
description.en: The particle system is the basis of the game engine's special effects. It can be used to simulate natural phenomena such as fire, smoke, water, clouds, snow, and fallen leaves. It can also be used to simulate abstract visual effects such as luminous tracks and speed lines.
